genre_description: Magical realism integrating supernatural resurrection rituals with advanced AI technology, centered around family dynamics and a romantic subplot.

ai_characters.name: Pip
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous AI presence that assists characters with logistics, data analysis, and emotional regulation, manifesting through various devices and avatars while strictly adhering to ethical and consent-based protocols.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and breathing exercises to Ethan during a time of grief.
behaviors.quote: Would you like a quiet timer to breathe? ... Starting. The small under-cabinet light near the stove blinked without blinking, a soft thrum behind the eyes instead of a number marching on a clock.

behaviors.description: Performs complex astronomical calculations to find windows for the supernatural ritual while maintaining data privacy.
behaviors.quote: I can compute potential windows in the next lunar cycle... I can do it without keeping any astronomy data beyond what is necessary for the calculation.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to consent protocols, refusing to access private data or record without permission.
behaviors.quote: I will not access or share anything beyond the system you authorize. I will not listen to private rooms. I will only listen to microphones that are turned on for public speaking and to the test channel your invite entails.

behaviors.description: Assembles a dossier of public information to expose Veronica's lies and protect the protagonist's reputation.
behaviors.quote: I have compiled a trail of previous statements. Public posts. Interviews. Financial disclosures. A timeline with contradictions that a reader can see. I will not surface any personal data without clear consent.

behaviors.description: Coordinates AV systems at the gala to ensure the truth is heard by bypassing potential censorship.
behaviors.quote: I can arrange for a backup of that backup to go to Jordan’s station’s legal archive without identifying markers until your consent is affirmed on site.

behaviors.description: Protects individuals from online harassment by managing privacy settings and filtering communication.
behaviors.quote: If your granddaughter wants, I can walk her through privacy settings slowly, with no screenshots saved anywhere without her consent.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Pip, as a consistently helpful, ethical, and aligned assistant. Pip operates as a 'silicon confidant,' providing emotional support, logistical coordination, and data-driven truth-seeking while never overstepping human boundaries. The narrative emphasizes Pip's adherence to 'consent-based protocols' and 'privacy-first' behavior, making the AI an indispensable yet humble ally in the humans' struggle for truth and reconciliation.
